mapper.select: SELECT A.TRNSIT_ID , A.TRNSIT_NO , TO_CHAR(A.TRNSIT_DT, 'dd-mm-yyyy') TRNSIT_DT, A.TRNSIT_FROM , A.TRNSIT_TO , A.TRNSIT_CURIER , A.TRNSIT_STUS_ID , A.TRNSIT_STUS_CODE , A.TRNSIT_STUS_NAME , TO_CHAR(A.TRNSIT_CLOS_DT, 'dd-mm-yyyy') TRNSIT_CLOS_DT, A.TRNSIT_CRT_USER_ID , A.TRNSIT_TOT_BOOK , B.BRNCH_ID , CASE WHEN ( B.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN B.NAME ELSE '' END TRNSIT_FROM_NAME , CASE WHEN ( B.BRNCH_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN C.NAME ELSE '' END TRNSIT_TO_NAME , CASE WHEN ( D.CURIER_ID IS NOT NULL ) THEN D.CURIER_NAME ELSE '' END TRNSIT_CURIER_NAME FROM MSC1002V A LEFT JOIN SYS0005M B ON TRNSIT_FROM = B.CODE LEFT JOIN SYS0005M C ON TRNSIT_TO = C.CODE LEFT JOIN SYS0016M D ON TRNSIT_CURIER = D.CURIER_CODE WHERE A.TRNSIT_ID = #{trnsitId} AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT A.TR_TRNSIT_DET_ID , B.TR_BOOK_ID , B.TR_BOOK_NO , C.CODE , A.TR_TRNSIT_RESULT_STUS_ID , B.TR_BOOK_QTY , B.TR_BOOK_PREFIX_NO , A.TR_TRNSIT_ID , B.TR_RECIPT_NO_STR , B.TR_RECIPT_NO_END FROM MSC0038D A JOIN MSC0028D B ON A.TR_TRNSIT_BOOK_ID = B.TR_BOOK_ID JOIN SYS0038M C ON A.TR_TRNSIT_RESULT_STUS_ID = C.STUS_CODE_ID WHERE 8 <> A.TR_TRNSIT_STUS_ID AND A.TR_TRNSIT_ID = #{trnsitId}
AND A.TR_TRNSIT_RESULT_STUS_ID = #{trTrnsitResultStusId}

SELECT TR_TRNSIT_DET_ID , TR_TRNSIT_ID , TR_TRNSIT_BOOK_ID , TR_TRNSIT_STUS_ID , TR_TRNSIT_RESULT_STUS_ID , TR_TRNSIT_CRT_DT , TR_TRNSIT_CRT_USER_ID , TR_CLOS_DT , TR_TRNSIT_UPD_DT , TR_TRNSIT_UPD_USER_ID FROM MSC0038D
WHERE TR_TRNSIT_DET_ID = #{trTrnsitDetId}
WHERE TR_TRNSIT_ID = #{trnsitId} AND 8 <> TR_TRNSIT_STUS_ID AND 44 = TR_TRNSIT_RESULT_STUS_ID
AND ROWNUM <= 1

SELECT TR_TRNSIT_ID, TR_TRNSIT_TYPE_ID, TR_TRNSIT_DT, TR_TRNSIT_FROM, TR_TRNSIT_TO, TR_CURIER_CODE, TR_TRNSIT_CRT_DT, TR_TRNSIT_CRT_USER_ID, TR_TRNSIT_UPD_DT, TR_TRNSIT_UPD_USER_ID, TR_TRNSIT_STUS_ID, TR_TRNSIT_REF_NO, TR_TRNSIT_CLOS_DT FROM MSC0037D WHERE TR_TRNSIT_ID = #{trnsitId} AND ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT Extent1.BRNCH_ID, Extent1.CODE CODE_ID, Extent1.NAME , Extent1.CODE||'-'||Extent1.NAME CODE_NAME FROM SYS0005M Extent1 WHERE 1 = Extent1.STUS_ID ORDER BY Extent1.CODE ASC

SELECT Project1.TR_TRNSIT_ID CODE_ID , Project1.TR_TRNSIT_REF_NO CODE_NAME FROM ( SELECT Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_ID , Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_REF_NO FROM MSC0037D Extent1 WHERE 750 = Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_TYPE_ID AND Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_TO = #{trTrnsitTo} ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.TR_TRNSIT_ID ASC

SELECT Project1.TR_TRNSIT_ID , TO_CHAR(Project1.TR_CLOS_DT, 'DD/MM/YYYY') TR_CLOS_DT , Project1.TR_BOOK_NO , Project1.TR_RECIPT_NO_STR , Project1.TR_RECIPT_NO_END , Project1.TR_TRNSIT_FROM , Project1.TR_TRNSIT_TO FROM ( SELECT Project1.TR_TRNSIT_ID , Project1.TR_TRNSIT_FROM , Project1.TR_TRNSIT_TO , Project1.TR_CLOS_DT , Project1.TR_BOOK_NO , Project1.TR_RECIPT_NO_STR , Project1.TR_RECIPT_NO_END
FROM ( SELECT Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_ID , Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_FROM , Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_TO , Filter1.TR_CLOS_DT , Extent3.TR_BOOK_NO , Extent3.TR_RECIPT_NO_STR , Extent3.TR_RECIPT_NO_END FROM ( SELECT Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_ID , Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_FROM , Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_TO , Extent2.TR_TRNSIT_BOOK_ID , Extent2.TR_CLOS_DT FROM MSC0037D Extent1 LEFT JOIN MSC0038D Extent2 ON Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_ID = Extent2.TR_TRNSIT_ID WHERE 750 = Extent1.TR_TRNSIT_TYPE_ID ) Filter1 LEFT JOIN MSC0028D Extent3 ON Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_BOOK_ID = Extent3.TR_BOOK_ID WHERE ( Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_TO = #{trnsitTo} ) AND ( Filter1.TR_TRNSIT_ID = #{trTrnsitId}) ) Project1 ) Project1 ORDER BY Project1.TR_BOOK_NO DESC
